title: Data Curation Matters: Model Collapse and Spurious Shift Performance Prediction from Training on Uncurated Text Embeddings
authors: L. Mattioli, Y.A. Hadichou, S. Chaouche, M. Gonzalez
summary: Training on uncurated text embeddings derived from raw tabular data can trigger model collapse leading to degenerate single‑class predictions; we study detection and metrics.

title: An End‑to‑End Method for Operationalizing Trustworthiness in AI‑based Critical Systems
authors: K. Quintero, L. Mattioli, H. Sohier, J. Mattioli
summary: End‑to‑end engineering method formalized within Confiance.ai for trustworthy ML‑based systems.

title: Leveraging Tropical Algebra to Assess Trustworthy AI
authors: J. Mattioli, M. Gonzalez, L. Mattioli, K. Quintero, H. Sohier
summary: MCDA methodology using tropical algebra for trustworthiness assessment.

title: A Black‑Box Watermarking Modulation for Semantic Segmentation Models
authors: M. Lansari, L. Mattioli, B. Addad, P.-M. Raffi, M. Gonzalez, K. Kapusta
summary: New black‑box watermarking technique tailored to semantic segmentation.

title: A Black‑Box Watermarking Modulation for Object Detection Models
authors: M. Lansari, L. Mattioli, B. Addad, P.-M. Raffi, K. Kapusta, M. Gonzalez, M. Ibn Khedher
summary: Black‑box watermarking method for object detection models.

title: Protecting Ownership Rights of ML Models Using Watermarking in the Light of Adversarial Attacks
authors: K. Kapusta, L. Mattioli, B. Addad, M. Lansari
summary: Bridges ML watermarking and adversarial patches to analyze model ownership protection.
